name: Swordmaster
text: You and your blade are as one. You are a master of the sword, able to employ your steel in ways that no lesser warrior can even imagine.

features.steelDefenseAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn
features.steelGrace(11thLevel): When you charge with a light blade or a heavy blade that is not a polearm, you can use cleave, reaping strike, sure strike, or tide of iron in place of a melee basic attack
features.steelBlitz(16thLevel): When you score a critical hit with a light blade or heavy blade, you regain the use of a fighter encounter attack power that you have already used during this encounter
